# Metricsv1

- [Coinapi Market Data Rest Api](https://docs.coinapi.io/coinapi-market-data-rest-api.md)
- [Current Metrics For Given Asset](https://docs.coinapi.io/current-metrics-for-given-asset.md)
- [Current Metrics For Given Exchange](https://docs.coinapi.io/current-metrics-for-given-exchange.md)
- [Current Metrics For Given Symbol](https://docs.coinapi.io/current-metrics-for-given-symbol.md)
- [Historical Metrics For Asset](https://docs.coinapi.io/historical-metrics-for-asset.md)
- [Historical Metrics For Symbol](https://docs.coinapi.io/historical-metrics-for-symbol.md)
- [Historical Metrics For The Exchange](https://docs.coinapi.io/historical-metrics-for-the-exchange.md)
- [Index](https://docs.coinapi.io/index.md)
- [Listing Of All Supported Exchange Metrics](https://docs.coinapi.io/listing-of-all-supported-exchange-metrics.md)
- [Listing Of All Supported Metrics By Coin Api](https://docs.coinapi.io/listing-of-all-supported-metrics-by-coin-api.md)
- [Listing Of All Supported Metrics For Asset](https://docs.coinapi.io/listing-of-all-supported-metrics-for-asset.md)
- [Listing Of All Supported Metrics For Symbol](https://docs.coinapi.io/listing-of-all-supported-metrics-for-symbol.md)
